projects.title: Shelter
projects.info: Adaptive two-page website for an animal kennel. It features a slider, burger menu, pagination and pop-ups.

projects.title: Momentum
projects.info: Momentum is an analogue of the Chrome Web Store app of the same name. The app shows the time and the user's name. The background image and welcome message change depending on the time of day.

projects.title: Museum
projects.info: The Louvre is one of the largest and most popular art museums in the world. Explore the former palace of the kings of France â€“ now the largest museum in the world covering almost 10,000 years of history!

projects.title: Midi Store
projects.info: AKAI Professional entered the electronic music industry in 1984 with one purpose - to give artists the tools they need to express and explore new musical possibilities. You can select the products you want, which will appear in the shopping cart.

projects.title: To Do App
projects.info: Application for writing notes or to-do lists. You can add, edit, delete, and mark completed notes. Notes are always saved. Supports mobile devices.

projects.title: Virtual Keyboard
projects.info: The main task of the application is to show user which key is pressed. In addition, the keys can be pressed with the mouse cursor or, for touch screens, with the user's finger.

projects.title: Color Dropper
projects.info: This application has five lines on which a random color is generated. The user can save the colors he likes and create the palette he wants. The colors are saved in a link.

projects.title: To Do App
projects.info: Application for writing notes or to-do lists. You can add, edit, delete, and mark completed notes. Notes are always saved. Supports mobile devices.

projects.title: My previous CV
projects.info: My old Curriculum Vitae (or just course of life). I used to think it was cool, but my views have changed over time. In any case, it is good as a project.

projects.title: Midi Store
projects.info: An example of an adaptive midi keyboard catalog for an online store using flexbox css.

projects.title: Drum Pad Machine
projects.info: This is a virtual copy of a drum machine. Use the keyboard to play sounds and samples. Write your own drum part and make a track.

projects.title: IOS Calculator
projects.info: A copy of the IOS calculator. It implements all the standard features and in addition provides such features as dividing by zero and finding percentages. The maximum number length that can be seen on the screen is 10 characters (including floating point numbers).

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.info: A classic game between two opponents on a 3 by 3 square field. Supported by mobile devices.
